name: Spebarky
description:
Hi! This is a prototype for a classic 2D grapple hook platformer. I want to try out how a classic grapple hook platformer feels when you have to juggle a longer or heavier body than usual. Therefore you play as a chubby long dog that can only move by throwing his leash around and use it to swing!

Notes
  • I will be streaming development on Twitch, main language is italian!
  • This is the very first prototype, so I hope to receive feedback and start improving the game! Hope you enjoy it and thank you for playing!
